mapper.select: select courseScheduleNo, course_schedule.courseNo, courseName, teacher.teacherNo, class.classNo, faculty.facultyNo, facultyName, major.majorNo, majorName, className, teacherName, time, week, place, startTime, endTime from course_schedule, course, teacher, class, faculty, major where course_schedule.courseNo = course.courseNo and course.teacherNo = teacher.teacherNo and course_schedule.classNo = class.classNo and major.majorNo = class.classMajorNo and faculty.facultyNo = major.majorFacultiesNo
mapper.insert:
select if(max(courseScheduleNo) is null, 1, max(courseScheduleNo) + 1) as newId from course_schedule
insert into course_schedule (courseScheduleNo,courseNo,classNo,time,week,place,startTime,endTime) values (#{courseScheduleNo},#{courseNo},#{classNo},#{time},#{week},#{place},#{startTime},#{endTime})
